txt.en: 'Ah, [placeholder], have you come to join me on a hunt? There's a beast upon the battlefield. They call the beast Azhatar. That is the beast I seek.'
This dwarf was mauled, just as the Orc you saw
'Rest well, for the war carries on. There may be other hunts upon the battlefield before the war's end. Good hunting, [placeholder].'
Howlers' Notch can be found in Elderslade.\n\nYou should search Howlers' Notch with Skarding by your side.
Search Howlers' Notch for Azhatar
Azhatarg has been defeated!
Examine the trail of destruction
The ground shakes as the beast approaches!
Use the whistle to summon Skarding if you become separated
Talk to Skarding Wargsbane at Shakal-atrâd

Defeat Azhatarg
'Call me to your side when you wish to begin the hunt.'
Examine where the trail of destruction ends
'The hunt was a success, as I knew it would be. The kill of Azhatarg is our reward! It has been a day well spent. Come let us return to Shakal-atrâd.'
Joining the Hunt
